verses.verse: God <S%G2316><s%>, who at sundry times <S%G4181><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in various manners <S%G4187><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> in time past <S%G3819><s%> to the fathers <S%G3962><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>,

Has <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> his Son <S%G5207><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> he has appointed <S%G5087><s%> heir <S%G2818><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> the worlds <S%G165><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> the brightness <S%G541><s%> of <S%G1391><s%> his glory <S%G1391><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the express image <S%G5481><s%> of <S%G5287><s%> his <S%G846><s%> person <S%G5287><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> upholding <S%G5342><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> by the word <S%G4487><s%> of <S%G1411><s%> his <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, when he had <S%G4160><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> purged <S%G2512><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, sat down <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of the Majesty <S%G3172><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> high <S%G5308><s%>;

Being made <S%G1096><s%> so much <S%G5118><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> than the angels <S%G32><s%>, as <S%G3745><s%> he has by inheritance obtained <S%G2816><s%> a more excellent <S%G1313><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> they <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> to which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> said he <S%G2036><s%> at any time <S%G4218><s%>, You <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, this day <S%G4594><s%> have <S%G1080><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> fathered <S%G1080><s%> you <S%G4571><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> a Son <S%G5207><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> he brings in <S%G1521><s%> the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%>, he says <S%G3004><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G4352><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G4314><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> he says <S%G3004><s%>, Who <S%G3588><s%> makes <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ministers <S%G3011><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> he says <S%G4675><s%>, Your throne <S%G2362><s%>, O God <S%G2316><s%>, is for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>: a scepter <S%G4464><s%> of righteousness <S%G2118><s%> is the scepter <S%G4464><s%> of <S%G932><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%>.

You have loved <S%G25><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>; therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G99999><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, even your <S%G4675><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, has anointed <S%G5548><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> with the oil <S%G1637><s%> of gladness <S%G20><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> fellows <S%G3353><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, You <S%G4771><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, in <S%G2596><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> have laid the foundation <S%G2311><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of <S%G5495><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>:

They <S%G846><s%> shall perish <S%G622><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> remain <S%G1265><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> shall wax old <S%G3822><s%> as does <S%G5613><s%> a garment <S%G2440><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> a vesture <S%G4018><s%> shall you fold <S%G1667><s%> them <S%G846><s%> up <S%G1667><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they shall be changed <S%G236><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> the same <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> shall <S%G1587><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> fail <S%G1587><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2046><s%> he at any time <S%G4218><s%>, Sit <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G99999><s%> I make <S%G5087><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> <S%G99999><s%> footstool <S%G5286><s%>?

Are they <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ministering <S%G3010><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, sent forth <S%G649><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> minister <S%G1248><s%> to <S%G1223><s%> them who <S%G3588><s%> shall be <S%G3195><s%> heirs <S%G2816><s%> of salvation <S%G4991><s%>?
